rules_text:
[i]Retainer[/i] – Noble spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Aching Blood [/i]– Whenever a [i]Crit[/i] ability you control triggers, Odin, Aching Blood deals damage equal to his power to target opponent.
[i]Missiletainn[/i] – As long as Odin is equipped, instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink and deathtouch.
